name: Orcs Must Die! 3
summary: Orcs Must Die! 3 ushers orc-slaying mayhem to a previously unimaginable scale. All new War Scenarios pit players and their friends against the largest orc armies ever assembled. War Machines give players the essential firepower to heave, stab, carbonize, and disarticulate the abominable intruders. Orcs Must Die! 3 is the long-awaited successor to the award-winning series.
info:
• 中文名: 兽人必须死3
  • 平台: Google Stadia
  • 游戏类型: Tower defense, ACT
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年7月14日
  • 官方网站: https://robotentertainment.com/omd3
  • 开发: Robot Entertainment
  • 发行: Stadia Games and Entertainment
